name: Dungeon Architect
author: NastyCat
content: Kang Chiwoo lost his life in an accident and got reincarnated as the son of a great demon lord in another world.Unlike his previous life as a map designer, he is now a loser named Kella.However, in a world where magic exists and having realized the dormant power of Kella, Chiwoo sets out to achieve his goal of creating his dream map that he couldn&#039t make in his past life...Will Kella be able to create his own map while fending off his brothers who constantly try to kill him, the countless th
